conbody.p: If the is ON, the BricsCAD Launcher dialog box displays when you launch . Here you can choose the Workspace for the current session. The available workspaces depend on the license level.

ul.li: 2D Drafting: launches the Drafting workspace. license or higher is required.
3D Modeling: launches the Modeling workspace. license or higher is required.
Mechanical design: launches the Mechanical workspace. or license is required.
BIM: launches the BIM workspace. or license is required.
Launch BricsCAD Shape: launches . No license is required.
Last used: launches the last used workspace.
Don't show again: sets the to 0. To reset the display of the BricsCAD Launcher dialog box, type getstarted in the command line and choose 1 for ON.
Units: sets the units for the default template drawing. Defines the .

conbody.note: The free solid modeling tool, , is built into the single installer. When the 30-day trial expires, it reverts to a perpetual license, which can be converted to a full commercial license by purchasing a license key. You do not need to uninstall first.
